settings.title: Settings
settings.themeDescription: Customize app theme and accent colors
settings.profileGuideDefault: Set up your profile to experience personalized AI üé®

notifications.enabled: Posty will notify you of important updates
Notifications enabled! We'll keep you updated on important news üîî
notifications.disabled: Notifications disabled. You can turn them back on anytime üòä

sound.enabled: Sound enabled! You'll hear sounds with every button press üîä

vibration.enabled: Vibration enabled! You'll feel haptic feedback with every touch üì≥

language.changed: Language has been changed. It will apply to newly generated content.

connect.title: Connect {{platform}}
connect.message: Would you like to connect your {{platform}} account?
connect.comingSoon: {{platform}} connection feature is coming soon! Please wait a little longer üöÄ

disconnect.title: Disconnect
disconnect.message: Are you sure you want to disconnect {{platform}}?
disconnect.success: {{platform}} has been disconnected. You can reconnect anytime!
disconnect.failed: Failed to disconnect. Please try again.

restore.title: Restore Purchases
restore.message: Would you like to restore previous purchases?
restore.failed: Failed to restore purchases. Please try again.

clearHistory.title: Clear History
clearHistory.message: Are you sure you want to clear all activity history?

deleteAll.title: Delete All Data
deleteAll.message:
Are you sure you want to delete all data?
This action cannot be undone.

logout.title: Logout
logout.message: Are you sure you want to logout?

rating.title: Rate App
rating.message: Has Posty been helpful? Please leave us a review!

dailyLimitExceeded.title: Daily Limit Exceeded
dailyLimitExceeded.message:
You've already earned the maximum of {{limit}} additional tokens today.
Try again tomorrow!

partialGrant.title: Partial Grant
partialGrant.message: Due to daily limit, only {{tokens}} tokens will be granted.

language.note: Language changes will apply to newly generated content.

welcome.title: Hello! I'm Posty
welcome.message: I'll help you write! Let's start comfortably without pressure üòä
welcome.subMessage: Even one line is enough, I'll make it amazing!

dawn.title: {{userName}}, feeling those late night vibes?
dawn.message: Your thoughts at this hour are special. Want to capture them?

morning.title: Good morning, {{userName}}!
morning.message: What will you share today? Even a morning coffee photo would be perfect!

lunch.title: {{userName}}, have you had lunch yet?
lunch.message: If you had something delicious, you should definitely show it off!

afternoon.title: {{userName}}, let's keep the momentum going!
afternoon.message: Wow, you've already written {{postCount}} posts today! That's amazing üëç
afternoon.messageDefault: Even a short post would be great. Let's capture today's moments

evening.title: {{userName}}, how was your day?
evening.message: How about writing a post to wrap up the day? Even something brief would be perfect

night.title: {{userName}}, still up?
night.message: Want to record what happened today before you sleep?

actions.helpDesc: Even one line is enough, I'll make it amazing!

actions.polishTextDesc: Transform awkward sentences into natural, flowing text

No need for long posts!
Just write what you did today
